activities.name: Copy SQL Join to CODA Integration

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
Nine.RegistrationID AS Nine_RegistrationId,
Nine.Numberofrecords AS Nine_Numberofrecords,
Nine.DebitRevenue AS Nine_DebitRevenue,
Nine.CreditSales AS Nine_CreditSales,
Nine.Multiplefilecode AS Nine_Multiplefilecode,
Eight.RegistrationID AS Eight_RegistrationId,
Eight.Accountnumber AS Eight_Accountnumber,
Eight.NewBalance AS Eight_NewBalance ,
Eight.Dateofnewbalance AS Eight_Dateofnewbalance,
One.RegistrationID AS One_RegistrationId,
One.BankAccountType AS One_BankAccountType,
One.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS One_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
One.Accountnumber AS One_Accountnumber,
One.Oldbalance AS One_Oldbalance,
One.Oldpay AS One_Oldpay ,
One.Dateofoldbalance AS One_Dateofoldbalance,
One.Accountholdername AS One_Accountholdername,
TwoOne.RegistrationID AS TwoOne_RegistrationId,
TwoOne.Sequencenumber AS TwoOne_Sequencenumber,
TwoOne.Amount AS TwoOne_Amount,
TwoOne.Valuedate AS TwoOne_Valuedate,
TwoOne.Accountdate AS TwoOne_Accountdate,
TwoTwo.RegistrationID AS TwoTwo_RegistrationId,
TwoTwo.Customerreference AS TwoTwo_Customerreference,
TwoTwo.BIC AS TwoTwo_BIC,
TwoTwo.Linkcode AS TwoTwo_Linkcode,
TwoThree.RegistrationID AS TwoThree_RegistrationId,
TwoThree.ArticleCode AS TwoThree_ArticleCode,
TwoThree.Counterpartyaccountnumber AS TwoThree_Counterpartyaccountnumber,
TwoThree.Nameofcounterparty AS TwoThree_Nameofcounterparty,
TwoThree.SuiteCode AS TwoThree_SuiteCode,
ThreeOne.RegistrationID AS ThreeOne_RegistrationId,
ThreeOne.ArticleCode AS ThreeOne_ArticleCode,
ThreeOne.CommunicationCode AS ThreeOne_CommunicationCode,
ThreeOne.MoreCode AS ThreeOne_MoreCode,
ThreeTwo.RegistrationID AS ThreeTwo_RegistrationId,
ThreeTwo.Sequencenumber AS ThreeTwo_Sequencenumber ,
ThreeTwo.ArticleCode AS ThreeTwo_ArticleCode,
ThreeTwo.Communication AS ThreeTwo_Communication,
Zero.RecordIdentification AS Zero_RecordIdentification,
Zero.CreationDate AS Zero_CreationDate ,
Zero.BankIdentificationNumber AS Zero_BankIdentificationNumber,
Zero.ApplicationCode AS Zero_ApplicationCode,
Zero.BIC AS Zero_BIC,
Zero.IdentificationNumberofBelgium AS Zero_IdentificationNumberofBelgium
from 
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-21]) TwoOne 
Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-22]) TwoTwo on TwoOne.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
Left OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-23]) TwoThree on TwoThree.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-31]) ThreeOne on ThreeOne.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-32]) ThreeTwo on ThreeTwo.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-33]) ThreeThree on ThreeThree.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-1]) One on One.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-8]) Eight on Eight.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-9]) Nine on Nine.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RecordIdentification) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-0]) Zero on Zero.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num

delete from GTFS
SELECT TOP(10) Agencies.Agency_name,
      10 AS Agency_id,
      Agencies.Agency_url,
      Agencies.Agency_timezone,
      Agencies.Agency_lang,
      Agencies.Agency_phone,
	  Route.Route_id,
	  Route.Route_short_name,
	  Route.Route_long_name,
	  Route.Route_desc,
	  10 AS Route_type,
	  Route.Route_url,
	  trip.Trip_id,
	  CONVERT(int, trip.Trip_short_name) AS Trip_short_name,
	  10 AS Direction_id,
	  trip.Block_id,
	  Cal.Service_id,	  
          case when Cal.Monday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Monday,   
		  case when Cal.Tuesday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Tuesday, 
		  case when Cal.Wednesday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Wednesday, 
		  case when Cal.Thursday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Thursday, 
		 case when Cal.Friday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Friday, 
		  case when Cal.Saturday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Saturday, 
		 case when Cal.Sunday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Sunday, 
	  Cal.Start_date,
	  Cal.End_date,
	  CalDate.Date,
	  10 AS Exception_type,
	  Shape.shape_id,
	  CONVERT(DOUBLE PRECISION, Shape.shape_pt_lat) AS shape_pt_lat,
	  CONVERT(DOUBLE PRECISION, Shape.shape_pt_lon) AS shape_pt_lon,
	  CONVERT(int, Shape.shape_pt_sequence) AS shape_pt_sequence,
	  NEWID() as GuId
  FROM [Routes] Route
  LEFT JOIN [Agency] Agencies
    ON Route.Agency_id = Agencies.Agency_id	
	JOIN [Trips] trip
    ON Route.Route_id = trip.Route_id
	JOIN [CalendarUpdate] Cal
    ON Cal.Service_id=trip.Service_id
	JOIN [calendar_dates_update] CalDate
	 ON Cal.Service_id=CalDate.Service_id
	JOIN [Shapes] Shape
    ON Shape.shape_id = trip.Shape_id
  ORDER by Agencies.Agency_id

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code_segment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dataflowSource
dataflowSource split(like(Code_segment,'000%'),
	like(Code_segment,'005%'),
	like(Code_segment,'004%'),
	like(Code_segment,'003%'),
	like(Code_segment,'002%'),
	like(Code_segment,'001%'),
	disjoint: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Segment0, Segment5, Segment4, Segment3, Segment2, Segment1, Others)
ConditionalSplit@Segment0 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg0
ConditionalSplit@Segment1 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = currentUTC(),
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = split(Code_segment,';')[10],
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg1
ConditionalSplit@Segment2 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = split(Code_segment,';')[10],
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12],
		Column13 = currentUTC(),
		Column14 = currentUTC(),
		Column15 = split(Code_segment,';')[15],
		Column16 = split(Code_segment,';')[16],
		Column17 = split(Code_segment,';')[17],
		Column18 = split(Code_segment,';')[18],
		Column19 = split(Code_segment,';')[19],
		Column20 = split(Code_segment,';')[20],
		Column21 = split(Code_segment,';')[21],
		Column22 = split(Code_segment,';')[22],
		Column23 = split(Code_segment,';')[23],
		Column24 = split(Code_segment,';')[24],
		Column25 = split(Code_segment,';')[25],
		Column26 = split(Code_segment,';')[26],
		Column27 = split(Code_segment,';')[27],
		Column28 = split(Code_segment,';')[28],
		Column29 = split(Code_segment,';')[29],
		Column30 = split(Code_segment,';')[30]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg2
ConditionalSplit@Segment3 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg3
ConditionalSplit@Segment5 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = currentUTC(),
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12],
		Column13 = split(Code_segment,';')[13]) ~> DerivedColumnseg5
ConditionalSplit@Segment4 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = split(Code_segment,';')[10],
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12],
		Column13 = split(Code_segment,';')[13],
		Column14 = split(Code_segment,';')[14],
		Column15 = currentUTC(),
		Column16 = split(Code_segment,';')[16]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg4
DerivedColumnSeg0 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Plateforme as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Plateforme = Column2
	)) ~> SQLSegment0
DerivedColumnSeg1 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Type_equipement as string,
		Num_syst_emetteur as string,
		CEB as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Num_service as string,
		Code_user as string,
		Compagnie_agent as string,
		Type_emplacement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Date_ope = Column4,
		Type_equipement = Column5,
		Num_syst_emetteur = Column6,
		CEB = Column7,
		Num_serie = Column8,
		Num_service = Column9,
		Code_user = Column10,
		Compagnie_agent = Column11,
		Type_emplacement = Column12
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment1
DerivedColumnSeg2 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_oper_vente as string,
		Type_mvt as string,
		Categ_produit as string,
		Num_produit as string,
		Num_article as string,
		Num_unicite as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Num_contrat as string,
		Num_serie_prev as string,
		Date_Debut as timestamp,
		Date_Fin as timestamp,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Montant_part_tiers as double,
		{Quantité} as string,
		TauxTVA_an as string,
		Montant_global_vente as double,
		Nb_jetons as string,
		Nb_jetons_avant as string,
		Id_convention as string,
		Libelle_convention as string,
		Num_mobib as string,
		Code_article as string,
		Num_reseau_produit as string,
		Num_contrat_prev as string,
		Num_commande as string,
		Num_elt_commande as string,
		Type_elt_commande as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_oper_vente = Column4,
		Type_mvt = Column5,
		Categ_produit = Column6,
		Num_produit = Column7,
		Num_article = Column8,
		Num_unicite = Column9,
		Num_serie = Column10,
		Num_contrat = Column11,
		Num_serie_prev = Column12,
		Date_Debut = Column13,
		Date_Fin = Column14,
		Id_entreprise = Column15,
		Montant_part_tiers = Column16,
		{Quantité} = Column17,
		TauxTVA_an = Column18,
		Montant_global_vente = Column19,
		Nb_jetons = Column20,
		Nb_jetons_avant = Column21,
		Id_convention = Column22,
		Libelle_convention = Column23,
		Num_mobib = Column24,
		Code_article = Column25,
		Num_reseau_produit = Column26,
		Num_contrat_prev = Column27,
		Num_commande = Column28,
		Num_elt_commande = Column29,
		Type_elt_commande = Column30
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment2
DerivedColumnSeg3 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Comm_struct as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_paiement = Column4,
		Code_moyen_paiement = Column5,
		Sens_paiement = Column6,
		Montant = Column7,
		Id_entreprise = Column8,
		Comm_struct = Column9
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment3
DerivedColumnSeg4 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Hardware_type as string,
		Mode_TPV as string,
		Brand_id as string,
		Machine_number as string,
		Pdv_clct_nr as string,
		Pdv_gen_tx_nb as string,
		Transaction_identifier as string,
		Dateh_tpe as timestamp,
		Auth_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_paiement = Column4,
		Code_moyen_paiement = Column5,
		Sens_paiement = Column6,
		Montant = Column7,
		Hardware_type = Column8,
		Mode_TPV = Column9,
		Brand_id = Column10,
		Machine_number = Column11,
		Pdv_clct_nr = Column12,
		Pdv_gen_tx_nb = Column13,
		Transaction_identifier = Column14,
		Dateh_tpe = Column15,
		Auth_code = Column16
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment4
DerivedColumnseg5 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		TransactionReference as string,
		TransactionDateTime as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		StatementReference as string,
		PaymentMeanBrand as string,
		ValueDate as timestamp,
		Amount as double,
		AuthorizationId as string,
		MerchantId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_paiement = Column4,
		TransactionReference = Column5,
		TransactionDateTime = Column6,
		Sens_paiement = Column7,
		StatementReference = Column8,
		PaymentMeanBrand = Column9,
		ValueDate = Column10,
		Amount = Column11,
		AuthorizationId = Column12,
		MerchantId = Column13
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment5

source(output(
		service_id as string,
		monday as string,
		tuesday as string,
		wednesday as string,
		thursday as string,
		friday as string,
		saturday as string,
		sunday as string,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DataFlowCalendersource
DataFlowCalendersource derive(start_date = toDate(substring(start_date,1,4)+"-"+substring(start_date,5,2)+"-"+substring(start_date,7,2)),
		end_date = toDate(substring(end_date,1,4)+"-"+substring(end_date,5,2)+"-"+substring(end_date,7,2))) ~> DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate
DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate sink(input(
		Service_id as string,
		Monday as string,
		Tuesday as string,
		Wednesday as string,
		Thursday as string,
		Friday as string,
		Saturday as string,
		Sunday as string,
		Start_date as date,
		End_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Service_id = service_id,
		Monday = monday,
		Tuesday = tuesday,
		Wednesday = wednesday,
		Thursday = thursday,
		Friday = friday,
		Saturday = saturday,
		Sunday = sunday,
		Start_date = start_date,
		End_date = end_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktoSQLCalendar

source(output(
		service_id as string,
		date as string,
		exception_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> dataflowcalendardatessource
dataflowcalendardatessource derive(date = toDate(substring(date,1,4)+"-"+substring(date,5,2)+"-"+substring(date,7,2))) ~> DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate
DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate sink(input(
		Service_id as string,
		Date as date,
		Exception_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Service_id = service_id,
		Date = date,
		Exception_type = exception_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktocalendardatesSQLtable

source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CODACSVfromADLS
CODACSVfromADLS split(like(Column_1,'0%'),
	like(Column_1,'1%'),
	like(Column_1,'2%'),
	like(Column_1,'3%'),
	like(Column_1,'8%'),
	like(Column_1,'9%'),
	like(Column_1,'4%'),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(HeaderRecord0, OldBalance1, Movement2, AdditionalInformation3, Newbalance8, TrailerRecord9, Freecommunications4, Others)
ConditionalSplit@HeaderRecord0 derive(HeaderColumn = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		Zeros = substring(Column_1,2,4),
		Creationdate = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,10,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,8,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,6,2)),
		BankIdentificationNumber = substring(Column_1,12,3),
		ApplicationCode = substring(Column_1,15,2),
		Duplicate = substring(Column_1,17,1),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,18,7),
		CodeSeperateApplication = substring(Column_1,84,5),
		TransactionReferrence = substring(Column_1,89,16),
		RelatedReferrence = substring(Column_1,105,16),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,83,1),
		VersionCode = substring(Column_1,128,1),
		FileReference = substring(Column_1,25,10),
		NameAddressee = substring(Column_1,35,26),
		BIC = substring(Column_1,61,11),
		IdentificationNumberOfBelgium = substring(Column_1,72,11),
		BlankColumn3 = substring(Column_1,121,7)) ~> AssignHeaderRecords
ConditionalSplit@OldBalance1 derive({RegistrationID } = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		BankAccountType = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumberofpaperaccount = substring(Column_1,3,3),
		Accountnumber = substring(Column_1,6,37),
		Oldbalance = substring(Column_1,43,1),
		Oldpay = toDecimal((substring(Column_1,44,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,56,3)),15,3),
		Dateofoldbalance = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,63,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,61,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,59,2)),
		Accountholdername = substring(Column_1,65,26),
		Accounttagged = substring(Column_1,91,35),
		{Sequencenumberofthecodified } = substring(Column_1,126,3)) ~> AssignOldBalancerecords
ConditionalSplit@Movement2 split(like(Column_1,'21%'),
	like(Column_1,'22%'),
	like(Column_1,'23%'),
	disjoint: true) ~> Movement2Split@(Movement21, Movement22, Movement23, NoMovement)
Movement2Split@Movement21 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		bankreferencenumber = substring(Column_1,11,21),
		Movementsign = substring(Column_1,32,1),

		BlankColumn = substring(Column_1,127,1),

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Top(100)
     E003.Code_segment
    ,E003.Poste_segment
    ,E003.Id_transaction
    ,E001.Num_serie
    ,E002.Id_entreprise
    ,E003.Id_paiement
    ,E003.Code_moyen_paiement
    ,E003.Sens_paiement
    ,E003.Montant
    ,10 AS Type_Eqiupment
    ,E001.Date_ope
    ,E000.Plateforme
	,NEWID() AS Unique_Id
  FROM [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_001] E001
  LEFT JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_002] E002
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E002.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_003] E003
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E003.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_000] E000
    ON E000.Code_segment = '000'
  ORDER by E001.id_transaction

activities.name: Copy data to Agency SQL Table
